revision.text:
'''{{class|Inventory}}'''
{{c|virtual void '''OwnerDied''' ()}}
== Usage == A [[ZScript virtual functions|virtual function]] called by {{class|Inventory}} items when their owner dies. In the base {{class|Inventory}} class does nothing.
Can be overridden to do perform some kind of an action when the owner of the item dies.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
== See also == * [[Inventory virtual functions]]
[[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:Inventory]] [[Category:ZScript virtual functions]]
